currentIssues.description: No visible focus indicators on any interactive elements including sidebar buttons, quick action buttons, and settings icon
Low contrast between dark gray text (#6B7280) and dark background (#1F2937) fails WCAG AA standards
currentIssues.location: Sidebar menu items, statuses text, and placeholder text

currentIssues.description: All metric cards have identical visual weight despite representing different data importance
currentIssues.location: Top metric cards (Repositories, Technologies, Research Tasks, Knowledge Base)

currentIssues.description: Quick action buttons lack hover states and have insufficient padding for touch targets
Inconsistent text sizing and weight hierarchy across different sections

recommendations.title: Increase text contrast for accessibility
recommendations.description: Update text colors to meet WCAG AA standards - use #9CA3AF minimum for dark backgrounds

recommendations.title: Implement comprehensive focus indicators
recommendations.description: Add visible focus rings to all interactive elements using focus-visible for keyboard navigation support
recommendations.code: className='... focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-blue-500 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 focus-visible:ring-offset-gray-900'

recommendations.title: Enhance quick action button interactivity
recommendations.description: Add hover states, increase padding for 44px touch targets, and add active states
recommendations.code: className='px-6 py-3 min-h-[44px] transition-all duration-200 hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-lg active:scale-95'

recommendations.title: Implement consistent 8px grid spacing
recommendations.description: Standardize all spacing to multiples of 8px for better visual rhythm
recommendations.code: className='p-4 space-y-4 gap-4' // Instead of mixed spacing values

recommendations.title: Differentiate metric card importance
recommendations.description: Use size, color intensity, or border treatments to establish primary vs secondary metrics
recommendations.code: className='border-2 border-blue-500/20 bg-blue-500/5' // For primary metric card
